text:
Lady Gaga hit the stage at Coachella on Saturday night, debuting a new single, "The Cure."

"I love you guys so much," she said to the crowd. "I have been through so much in my life and I've seen so much. And you cure me every time with your love."

The song, which decidedly has EDM roots, sings, "If I can't find the cure, I'll / I'll fix you with my love / No matter what you know, I'll / I'll fix you with my love."

The song has already become No. 1 on Worldwide iTunes charts and the reaction on social media was overwhelmingly positive.

Lady Gaga debuted new song 'The Cure' at Coachella and now we just want to dance @yosexodur

~Now playing Lady Gaga - The Cure



Me: ...@ladygaga pic.twitter.com/x6fzMTEVoX @antonioD15

Couldn't think of a better song to dance naked in the dark to than The Cure @ladygaga @MiamiSmiles7

Thank you Lady Gaga for being The Cure since 2008! @LadyGagaUpdated

BREAKING: North Korea releases peace treaty with United Nations after The Cure-Lady Gaga shoots to #1. "It's what she deserves" -Kim Jong @alexmalloyy

Congrats Lady Gaga! Your new single 'The Cure' debuts at #1 on WW iTunes! @ladygaga @ViviLittleM

Doctor Lady Gaga just discovered the cure for ALL diseases. Buy her new single The Cure and get cured bitch. @HausOfInfo

Fitting that @ladygaga called this new single "The Cure," it is appropriate because it has cured me of my sadness, ennui, nihilism, eczema, @haleybartels
